column4: how can i bind in a seperate hdd as /home into a new jaunty-installation without deleting the files on it???
you need to set a mount point in fstab for the new /home
a quick google search found this article about doing it: http://ubuntu.wordpress.com/2006/01/29/move-home-to-its-own-partition/
might be a way to do it with a gui, but it's a little bit complicated and could prevent you from logging in if you do it wrong so best research it carefully first
